content: this cute little baby hat and booties match my chloe baby cardigan jacket which is proving to be very popular garter stitch is back in demand this would make a sweet little baby shower gift perfect for a newborn baby and - easy to knit on straight needles requires dk yarn i used just 30g to knit both hat and booties 4mm needles **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
